help.message:
How to use me? Which commands are availables? What to do with me? All of these questions have an answer here: https://callmegus.xyz/helpme.

Otherwise you can run `{prefix}help list` to get a summmary of the commands.
help.fullList: Get a full list and usages of the commands on https://callmegus.xyz

errors.useHelpCommand: To get the list of the commandes, use `{prefix}help`.
errors.badArgs: Bad arguments ! Learn how the command works using `{prefix}help`.
errors.basicError: Error while executing the command. Please contact an administrator
